title: Mother says she found special needs son wearing trash bag in class
text:
The mother of a CPS special needs child wants answers after she found her son wearing a trash bag when she visited his kindergarten classroom. 5-year-old Lloyd lives with epilepsy and is non-verbal.
See the full story at WGN Sports
